summary: This document contains detailed financial statements from Bear Stearns & Co. Inc. for various accounts, including cash flow analyses, portfolio holdings, and transaction details. It highlights the performance of investments, including equities and cash balances, over specified periods.

persons.name: Alan C. Greenberg
persons.context: Alan C. Greenberg is mentioned as the account executive for the financial statements, overseeing the accounts detailed in the document.

persons.name: Larry Kemp
persons.context: Larry Kemp is referenced as the contact for the financial trust company associated with the accounts detailed in the statements.

connections.description: Alan C. Greenberg is the account executive overseeing accounts that involve Larry Kemp, who is associated with the financial trust company.

events.title: Financial Summary Statement
events.description: The financial summary statement details the opening balance, dividends, and closing balance for various accounts managed by Bear Stearns.

locations: 383 Madison Avenue, New York, New York 10179
6100 Red Hook Quarter, Suite 8-3, St Thomas VI 00802
keyFacts: The document includes multiple financial statements detailing cash balances, equities, and dividends for various accounts.
Alan C. Greenberg is identified as the account executive managing these accounts.
Larry Kemp is noted as a contact for the financial trust company associated with the accounts.
The total estimated annual income for the accounts is reported at various amounts throughout the document.
The statements reflect significant fluctuations in net equity and cash balances over the reporting periods.
